description:
Embark on a romantic adventure across the colorful landscapes of Rio de Janeiro in Hentai Dating Stories: Brazil. Play as Touji Ishikawa, a young heir to a prestigious family business in Japan, as he ventures into the vibrant streets of Rio de Janeiro in search of true love.

In this visual novel with puzzle mechanics, immerse yourself in Touji's quest to break free from the expectations of his family and discover his path in life.

Meet Tainara Alves, a spirited Brazilian beauty whose passion for dance and zest for life will ignite a spark within Touji's heart. Explore the bustling streets of Rio de Janeiro, from the dazzling lights of Carnival to the tranquil shores of Copacabana Beach, as you uncover the secrets of Tainara's world.

But the path to true love is never easy, and Touji and Tainara will face their fair share of challenges along the way. Join them as they unravel mysteries and solve puzzles to see what’s waiting for you next.

KEY FEATURES:
– Pocket love story
– Over 19 puzzles to solve along the way – the difficulty level rises going forward
– Beautiful anime-style characters
– Not the last Touji journey
name: Hentai Dating Stories: Brazil
